headline: Energy sector is looking at gas more favorably than oil: Mizuho
summary: The analyst team out of Mizuho has upgraded Occidental Petroleum stock (OXY) from Neutral to Outperform as Wall Street is seeing an energy sector (XLE) pivot back into traditional energy, like oil (CL=F, BZ=F) and gas (RB=F). Mizuho Americas managing director Nitin Kumar comes on Market Domination to speak more about this call and companies' exposure to various energy sources. Kumar also comments on the dealmaking and consolidation trends in the broader energy landscape. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: Energy sector is looking at gas more favorably than oil: Mizuho
content.description:
The analyst team out of Mizuho has upgraded Occidental Petroleum stock (OXY) from Neutral to Outperform as Wall Street is seeing an energy sector (XLE) pivot back into traditional energy, like oil (CL=F, BZ=F) and gas (RB=F).

Mizuho Americas managing director Nitin Kumar comes on Market Domination to speak more about this call and companies' exposure to various energy sources. Kumar also comments on the dealmaking and consolidation trends in the broader energy landscape.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out moreÂ Market Domination.

headline: Is Occidental Petroleum Stock a Buy After Its $9.7 Billion Deal With Warren Buffett-Led Berkshire Hathaway?
summary: Oxy turns to a familiar investor to raise cash and improve its balance sheet.

content.title: Is Occidental Petroleum Stock a Buy After Its $9.7 Billion Deal With Warren Buffett-Led Berkshire Hathaway?
